means.word_mean: 同情的,悲伤的,安慰的,胸怀广大的,慷慨的,仁慈的,温柔的
意气相投的,亲密的,友好的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'relating to an affinity or paranormal influence, as in sympathetic magic'): from sympathy, on the pattern of pathetic

entry.def: If you are sympathetic to someone who is in a bad situation, you are kind to them and show that you understand their feelings.

example.ex: She was very sympathetic to the problems of adult students...
example.tran: 她对成年学生的问题深表同情。

example.ex: It may be that he sees you only as a sympathetic friend.
example.tran: 也许他只是把你当作一个可以倾诉的朋友。

entry.def: If you are sympathetic to a proposal or action, you approve of it and are willing to support it.

example.ex: She met people in London who were sympathetic to the Indian freedom struggle...
example.tran: 她在伦敦结识了一些支持印度独立运动的人。

example.ex: His speeches against corruption may find a sympathetic hearing among some Trinidadians.
example.tran: 他关于反腐反贪的讲话可能会赢得一些特立尼达岛居民的支持。

entry.def: You describe someone as sympathetic when you like them and approve of the way that they behave.

example.ex: She sounds a most sympathetic character.
example.tran: 她听起来是个很招人喜欢的人物。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the sympathetic nervous system;
2. expressing or feeling or resulting from sympathy or compassion or friendly fellow feelings; disposed toward;

sentences.sentence: "with their many similar tastes, he found her a most sympathetic companion"

means.word_mean: 4. showing or motivated by sympathy and understanding and generosity;

sentences.sentence: "was charitable in his opinions of others"

means.word_mean: 5. (of characters in literature or drama) evoking empathic or sympathetic feelings;
6. relating to vibrations that occur as a result of vibrations in a nearby body;

auth_sentence.content: You needn't stop to discourse with sympathetic listeners.

kin运动+etic属于……的→adj.动力[学]的;活动的
peri周围+pat拍+etic属于……的→走遍→巡游

means.word_mean: 同情的; 有同情心的; 表示同情的(~to/towards sb)

sentences.cn: 他是一个有同情心的人。

sentences.en: She was very sympathetic when my mother died.
sentences.cn: 她对我母亲的去世深表同情。

sentences.en: They were quite sympathetic to our proposals.
sentences.cn: 他们很赞同我们的建议。
